modName: Silverstone - Champion of The Olde CotO
summary: This is a Mod to change the In game responses of The PC to sound more Decisive, Assertive and Powerful (Male and Female) during the times where the PC must respond.
descriptionHtml:
This is a Mod to change the In game responses of The PC to sound more Decisive, Assertive and Powerful (Male and Female) during the times where the PC must respond. 

An example being:
Guard: Stop that...Shouting, Its making people nervous!
PC: My apologies. I meant no harm. || I don\'t recall there being a law against Shouting.
Guard: Good. Glad That\'s settled. || Maybe not but I\'ll drag you to the dungeons myself.
PC: You will die Trying...

So far there is alot of text needed to change and I have barely scratched it. Odds are you won\'t notice a change until I actually have the time to do some major changes. I\'ll Upload what I have just for ease of access. You can download it but there\'s no point atm as only a few things have changed.

What has been Modified:
A few Texts concerning Jobs like Extermination have been modified. The rest is untouched.
author: Silverstone

files.name: The Voice of Olde
files.changelogHtml: Changed 3 Minor Vanilla \"Job\" interactions to CotO
